summary: This document is a Sexual Offender Registration Form for an individual required to register as a sex offender in the Virgin Islands. It outlines the responsibilities of the offender regarding travel and lodging notifications, as well as the legal implications of failing to comply with registration requirements.

persons.name: Jeff
persons.context: Jeff is mentioned as the recipient of the notification regarding the duty to report travel as a registered sex offender.

events.title: Notification of Duty to Report Travel
events.description: Jeff was advised of his responsibilities to report any changes in temporary lodging and travel plans as a registered sex offender.

keyFacts: Jeff is required to inform the Virgin Islands Department of Justice of any changes to his temporary lodging.
He must appear in person at least 21 days prior to any intended travel outside of the United States.
Failure to comply with registration requirements may lead to criminal prosecution.
